### The ten most used in packages

```{r}
db %>%
  count(clean_license, sort = TRUE) %>%
  top_n(10)
```

#### MIT

- https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/MIT

+ Can

/ Commercial Use 
/ Modify 
/ Distribute 
/ Sublicense 
/ Private Use


+ Can't

/ Can't hold liable

+ Must

/ Include Copyright
/ Include Licence

Don't forget : 

Entry of the form:
```
YEAR:
COPYRIGHT HOLDER: 
```

```{r eval = FALSE}
usethis::use_mit_license("NAME")
```

## "Non-standard"

### Region-based licenses

Example: CeCILL - http://www.cecill.info/

```{r}
db$clean_license %>%
  grep(pattern = "cecill", x = ., value = TRUE) %>%
  length()
```

## Restrictive licenses

```{r}
db %>% 
  filter(license_restricts_use == "yes") %>%
  select(package, license)
```
